txt.en: 'You have done well, [placeholder]! You have played a great role in our time, for Moria and for fair Lothlórien as well.\n\n'The sickness bred by the contamination of the waters in Dâr Narbugud will not trouble us further, thanks to you and your noble companions.'
'Have you used the cleansing water? You can find the chambers you seek in the vilest corners of Dâr Narbugud, in the southern-most reaches of the Foundations of Stone.'
Dâr Narbugud: Purifying the Fungal Contagions

'You have done well, [placeholder]! You have played a great role in our time, for Moria and for fair Laothlórien as well.\n\n'The sickness bred by the contamination of the waters in Dâr Narbugud will not trouble us further, thanks to you and your noble companions.'
'Have you used the cleansing water? You can find the chambers you seek in the vilest corners of Dâr Narbugud, in the southern-most reaches of the Foundations of Stone.'
Filth washed away

'Please take the phial of pure water and use it to cleanse the Globsnaga fungus in the chambers of rancour in Dâr Narbugud.\n\nThe chambers can be found in the southernmost reaches of Moria's Foundations of Stone.'
This is an ideal place to use Galadriel's draught
This place is not ideal for cleansing

The chambers of rancour can be found in Dâr Narbugud, in the southern-most reaches of Moria's Foundations of Stone.\n\nYou should use the contents of the phial to cleanse the rancourous chambers of transformation within Dâr Narbugud.
Filth washed away
Donfuin is outside of Dâr Narbugud in Moria.\n\nYou should return to Donfuin and inform him of your success in purifying the most corrupted places in Moria.
This is an ideal place to use Galadriel's draught
This place is not ideal for cleansing
Filth washed away
This is an ideal place to use Galadriel's draught
This place is not ideal for cleansing
Purify the liquid in Îstum's plague-chamber
Purify the liquid in Zholuga's plague-chamber
Purify the liquid in Flâgît's plague-chamber
Talk to Donfuin
Talk to Celeborn at Caras Galadhon
Purify the liquid in Flâgît's plague-chamber
Talk to Celeborn at Caras Galadhon
Celeborn has devised a means to ensure the Globsnaga fungus never survives once the legions of the infested are destroyed.

'Kind [placeholder], you have done much for us in these ventures to Dâr Narbugud. I see that our wishes are the same: we both desire to see the balance of Moria restored and for all the unnatural blights to be swept away.

'Please take this ere you depart. It is a phial of pure water from Galadriel's garden, clear and clean as spring rain, and blessed by my Lady ere it was passed to my hands. You may use it to purify the deadly liquid in the chambers where the Orcs undergo their transformation. 

'The roots of evil will wither and die with this draught flowing as blood in their veins. A little purity may go far in that forsaken place, [placeholder]. This draught of Lórien will bring an end to the fell winter of sickness and plague in Dâr Narbugud.'
